page.title: 06The Village Garden Fete.
page.content: Every year in the middle of July we hold a Garden Fete. Each year we hold it at a different place. This year it was in the back garden of the Manor.The garden is really huge. We have a mixture of different stalls.The most popular stalls this year were the tombola and the stall when you had to hit the golf ball into a hole.If you did,you won a pound. Each year we have a Best Dressed Teddy Bear competition for children.This year a teddy butcher and a teddy witch won it. There was a display by the local dancing group.It is very soon splitting up,and so people will be going to other dancing schools. The fete started at two thirty in the afternoon, and ended, really, when everyone went home.
